<!-- ======= 2 ‑‑‑‑‑ Investment Society Leadership =================== -->
## Investment Society Leadership Roles 

I started serving in the Investment Society in 2022, where I have held various leadership positions. My roles have included: Secreaty, Vice President, Bloomberg Specialist, and Society President. I have also been a member of the Society's Executive Board, where I have helped to shape the direction and strategy of the organization.


During this time I obtain the Bloomberg BMC and ESG certificates, led and encouraged students to participated in the 2023 and 2024 Bloomberg Global Trading Challenge, where we consistently saw positive returns and rank among the top teams worldwide. I also organized and led weekly meetings, where we discussed current market trends, investment strategies, and the latest news in the financial world.
